thread.title: INCREDIBLE ROOM, STAFF AND SERVICE
thread.title_full: INCREDIBLE ROOM, STAFF AND SERVICE - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aaron o
title: INCREDIBLE ROOM, STAFF AND SERVICE
text:
I've been in the hospitality business for many years, and on a recent business trip to NYC, I booked a room for two nights at NYLO. The location was close to my office so it worked perfectly, staff was cheerful, considerate and generous. I'd requested a high floor, and Ramona made my trip! She organized a beautiful room for me, and the rest of the staff was just as cheerful and helpful.
I will continue to stay here on future trips to NYC. The experience of great service is something that transports a guest to another place. For me, after two 18 hour days on a business trip, Ramona and the rest of the staff, transported me to feel right at home.
Room Tip: great views, fantastic location, parking garage a block away See more room tips
